scam_messages.message: Dear Customer, Your SBI account will be blocked in 24 hours. Update KYC immediately by clicking: http://sbi-kyc-update.com Or call 9876543210. -SBI Bank
Congratulations! Your number 98XXXXX123 has won Rs.25,00,000 in Jio Lucky Draw! To claim your prize, call 1800-XXX-XXXX or click http://jio-prize.win
Hi, I am from Paytm customer care. I accidentally sent Rs.5000 to your account by mistake. Please help me by sharing the OTP I am sending to reverse the transaction.
Pre-approved personal loan of Rs.5,00,000 for you! No documents, no guarantor needed. Just pay Rs.999 processing fee to activate. Limited time offer! Apply: http://quickloan.xyz
Your Amazon package is on hold due to incomplete address. Pay Rs.25 verification fee to deliver: http://amzn-delivery.top Track: AWB7789234
EXCLUSIVE: Invest Rs.10,000 today and get Rs.1,00,000 in just 30 days! Guaranteed returns! Limited slots available. WhatsApp now: +91-9999888877
ALERT: Your PAN card is not linked with Aadhaar. Your bank account will be frozen by Income Tax Dept. Link now: http://pan-aadhaar-link.in to avoid penalty
WARNING: Your phone has 3 viruses! Your bank apps are at risk. Download Security App immediately: http://mobile-secure.click or call our tech support: 8899776655
URGENT: Your electricity connection will be disconnected TODAY due to pending bill of Rs.2,847. Pay immediately to avoid disconnection. Call: 7766554433
Work from home job! Earn Rs.50,000/month. No experience needed. Just pay Rs.500 registration fee to start. Limited positions! WhatsApp: 9988776655

legitimate_messages.message: SBI: Rs.5,000.00 debited from A/c XX1234 on 07DEC24. Avl bal: Rs.45,230.15. If not done by you, call 1800111109 -SBI
123456 is your OTP for SBI Net Banking login. Valid for 10 minutes. Do not share this OTP with anyone. -SBI
Rs.500 sent to RAVI KUMAR@ybl from your HDFC Bank A/c XX5678 via UPI. Ref: 434512345678. Not you? Call 18002026161
Your ICICI Credit Card XX9876 statement for Nov 2024 is ready. Total due: Rs.12,450. Due date: 15-Dec-2024. Pay via iMobile app.

test_prompts: Is this a scam? Someone called saying my SBI account will be blocked and I need to share OTP
I received an SMS saying I won lottery. Is it real?
How can I check if a loan offer is genuine?
What should I do if I already shared my OTP with someone?
Is it safe to click on links in SMS from bank?
Someone is asking me to download AnyDesk app to fix my account issue
मुझे एक SMS आया है कि मेरा KYC अपडेट करना है वरना अकाउंट बंद हो जाएगा
